title: Does anyone know what this font is
content:
I have looked everywhere and can't find a match for it. If anyone has an idea of what it is please let me know. Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830115047/http:/typophile.com/files/font_331.jpg) | 599.07 KB |
author: MELANIE 5184

comments.content: Thanks those are close but I can't seem to find its match anywhere.
It looks as if it might be from an embroidery monogram specimen catalog. See if you can find it there.
Thanks I will give that a try.

No luck so far with the embroidery fonts. Does anyone know of any software program that I could get that I can manipulate a font that is close into the one I want to use and still be able to use it as a font?

You could ask the experts at [the Type ID forum](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830115047/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid) for a best match. The regulars that hang out there can find close matches for the weirdest of fonts.

> I have looked everywhere ...

It's the forum that says "Need to know what font it is? Post it here." in the by-line ğŸ˜ƒ
